simulation module

simulation.createSimulation(inputInformation)[source]

Creates the simulation with all user inputs

Parameters:

inputInformation (Dictionary)

Returns:

simulationDict - the dictionary containing all information about the simulation run

Return type:

Dictionary

simulation.endSimulation(junction)[source]

Description: Gathers all information and packages it into a dictionary to be passed off for processing

Parameters:

junction (Junction) – the junction that the information is being gathered from

Returns:

simulationDict - the dictionary containing all information about the simulation run

Return type:

Dictionary

simulation.runSimulation(junction)[source]

Description: Runs the simulation for the given junction

Parameters:

junction (Junction) – the junction that the simulation processed for

simulation.processGreenLane(lane, currentTime, junction)

Processes vehicle during greenlight time for a lane

simulation.processGreen(direction, direction, currentTime, junction)

Processes the green light for all lanes of a direction

simulation.shouldActivatePedestrianCrossing(junction, currentTime, crossingRequests)

checks whether the pedestrian crossing should ne activated given the current time

simulation.processWaitingVehiclesLane(lane, currentTime)

processes the vehicles that’ve arrived up to the currentTime

simulation.processWaitingVehicles(direction, currentTime, CB)

processes the vehicles that’ve arrived for a whole direction

simulation.processOppositeLane(lane, lightTime, currentTime, junction)

processes opposing left lane

Returns:

the simulationDict of all information about the simulation after it has run

Return type:

Dictionary
